name: GitHub Actions: Python Pytest
description: Run pytest with caching on CI.

files.template:
name: Pytest

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'
          cache: 'pip'
      - run: pip install -U pip pytest
      - run: pytest -q
